section.title: Viewing Analysis History for an Instance or Image
section.para: Each time a SmartState Analysis is performed on an instance, a record is created of the task. This information is accessed either from the Instance Accordion or the Instance Summary. Use this detail to find when the last analysis was completed and if it completed successfully. If the analysis resulted in an error, the error is shown here.

step.para: Click the accordion for the desired item to view analysis history.
Click on the item to view its Summary.
From the Relationships area in the Summary, click Analysis History. A history of up to the last 10 analyses is displayed.
Click on a specific analysis to see its details.
